result.title: Who am I
paragraph: I firmly believe in pursuing careers aligned with one's talents and passions. Web development is my chosen profession, reflecting my confidence in this field. I am dedicated to hard work and honesty. I graduated from the University of Computer Studies, Meiktila, with a degree in Computer Science and enhanced my knowledge with modern web design and development classes.

My educational background led me to become a Software Engineer, where I thrive on finding innovative solutions for everyday challenges. With over 4 years of experience, I've honed my critical thinking and collaboration skills. I greatly enjoy working within a team and have made significant contributions to over a dozen projects.
